name: Mahrty & Mahrdy
description:
Mahrty & Mahrdy

This game was made for Brackeys GameJam 2021.1 following the theme "Stronger Together"

IMPORTANT INFORMATION Main Goal

Control two dinosaurs to get the key and open the treasure chest.

Items and Objects

Key: Grab the key to open the treasure. 

Potion: When used the other Dinosaur will teleport to you.

Crate: Push it to anywhere you want so you can jump over it.

Treasure Chest: Open it using the key to proceed to the next level.

NOTE: The Dinosaurs can jump over each other. 

NOTE: Only the Dinosaur who grabbed the key can open the treasure.

Controls

Move: W A S D

Jump: Spacebar

Switch Players: F

Toggle Zoomed Out View: Z

Toggle Pause Game: P

Reset Level: R

NOTE: Hold space longer to jump higher.

NOTE: Use the zoomed-out view to see the level completely, you can only control the Dinosaurs while zoomed in.
